author: juneb
body: Just wondering why https is not permitted. When we doc'd in 3.0, any HelpInfoUri value with http or https was valid. The docs (https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/hh852735(v=vs.85).aspx) have not been updated.

comments.author: ghost
comments.body:
Sorry, but am confused. The doc you points to says (under Step 2: Add a HelpInfoURI...) : For security, the address must begin with "http" or "https". The URI should specify an Internet location, but must not include the HelpInfo XML file name.
Is the problem that it's not working somewhere?

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @juneb both should work, I think it only fails if you put in a https uri that redirects to an http uri

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: Latest helpinfouris are all using https

title: Question:  Why is https not permitted in HelpInfoUri?
